Founded in {year}, La Playita is a Mexican restaurant that offers up authentic food. Located in the Redwood Plaza on South San Jose, La Playita caters to those seeking great food and even better company. Family owned and operated, La Playita specializes in its amazing enchiladas and tamales. Come in or dine out! Todos somos familia en La Playita!
